Type.BattleDialog: We must overcome crises in order to climb to higher positions.
I am okay. Prioritize your own safety first.
Don’t be impatient. Anxiety causes you to lose willpower and focus.
I wish these books have valuable information to provide.
…That was fierce. Let us pull out with the other survivors.
I was so close to reaching what I want…
…A moment of silence.
You’ve done well holding out until the end. …Thank you for being with us.
You’ll end up exposing your weakness if you cannot minimize redundant moves.
I won’t make light of any death, even of my foes.
The mission isn’t quite complete yet, so stay serious.
Don’t worry, director. We’ll assist you thoroughly.
This is a pretty wide space… I’ve never seen this kind of thing in a request before.
I’m nearly at my breaking point… Be careful and stay safe, everyone.
…I’m sure our director has a bright idea.
What could they possibly be planning to put us through this…
No… The others will have an even harder time…
It had to be… I’ll fight harder… for you.
Director!!! …You dare… You dared hurt Director Yujin…
Be mindful that my stance isn’t broken no matter what…
I can hold on… I have to make it through.
I’m alright. I still have enough force left in my body to proceed.
They do not appear to be pushovers by any means.
I will be counting on you, director.
Engaging in combat, like we always have.
We’ve finished this job, but I must say I’m not too delighted…
I’m just nervous thinking about the possibility that this isn’t the end.
This is my limit… I’m sorry I couldn’t hold out for longer.
…I’ll kill them all in your stead.
I swear I will end your lives with my own blade…
I should be glad that I have this much strength left to muster…
There may be only a few left to deal with, we should stay ever vigilant.
Your movement was all but distracting.
Is it really necessary to push ourselves to the edge with jobs like this…
This has to be part of some conspiracy we aren’t aware of. It doesn’t make sense otherwise…
We just need to remove our targets as always. Let’s not complain about it.
Keep your eyes on the targets if you have the energy to chat. They’re coming.
I agree with the others. I’m too tired to get this job done…
…I hope this was the last.
I am glad we could manage to finish this.
I’m not in the state to take any more work…
…I knew this would happen.
If my body was in a better state… I wouldn’t have had trouble with this.
Don’t panic guys, just… focus on the mission.
You must’ve been exhausted… Rest well.
…I’m scared I might meet the same fate soon enough.
None of us seem to be in a good state… We should end this quickly.
That was an easy target, moved just as I expected.
How long can I go on… I’m not quite certain.
…We should fulfill our responsibility.
Swift and clean… We aim for our target specifically.
This area, and the beings that inhabit this place… It’s all an enigma.
